casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Amanda Gayle REED 331A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 18, 2016 Matthew C. Coxe, Attorney at Law, for Reed, Amanda Gayle. Melody R. Hairston, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of October 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of October 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
